title: Snow!
author: JGray
text:
Its the start of spring and, yet, we have snow. I'm so tired of snow.

Bleh.

Thank you all for sticking with us to this point. I realize this hasn't been an action heavy storyline but it has been, I feel, important to the development of both Chrys and Theresa and their relationship.

replies.author: Erika*Guest*
replies.text: I dunno. William seems to be in the process of giving Theresa the action-packed kick to the behind that she needs!

replies.author: keison*Guest*
replies.text: I just wanted to say that I think the dialog in this and the other recent pages are really great. Its not that previous chapters didnt have good dialog its just that I have felt its gotten better now.

replies.author: JGray
replies.text:
Erika, exactly!

Keison. Thank you! That was something I needed to hear.

replies.author: Johan*Guest*
replies.text:
You can't be tired of snow! Snow is awesome. I don't get nearly enough of it.
... And this can't be my first comment here. Hi JGray, love your webcomic ^^
... Can't be my firt comment either ... damn, I'll just ... oh I know I know!! I need a few hours, I'll get back to you after work
